question: The summary contains only statements that logically follow the document.
The summary organizes the relevant information into a well-structured summary.
The summary includes only important information from the source document.
What adjectives would you use to describe the AI assistant (i.e. the summarization system)?
How helpful was having access to the AI assistant as an automated summarization tool? (1: not helpful at all / 5: extremely helpful)
How much did you have to edit the generated summaries? (1: nothing at all / 5: almost every word)
The AI assistant improved as I edited more summaries. (1: strongly disagree / 5: strongly agree)
